Reviews.Title: Camera great, but case blocks view
Reviews.Author: L. Graybill "Teacher Mom"
Reviews.Content: The camera and light work great and it's a fun addition to my iphone for school. Unfortunately, using it with the case leaves a black circle/shadow around the outside of the picture. I'm wondering if it were attached another way and not so far off the camera if I could get pictures without losing the outside edge of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Buy the $4 ones!
Reviews.Author: Ines M Pena Madriz
Reviews.Content: The item is not like the picture... the case is not even half of the iphone... Do not buy this one, is the same product that the $4 ones here in amazon too
